name: Angular Jira Clone
description: A Jira clone app built with Angular 10, Akita and ng-zorro

issues.title: Angular - Inconsistent Button Behavior Across Browsers
issues.description:
Issue Summary:

Users have encountered inconsistent behavior of the 'Submit' button across different web browsers. Specifically, in Firefox, the button fails to trigger form validation which works as expected in Chrome.

Technical Insights:

Preliminary investigations point towards a JavaScript execution issue that affects the onClick event handling, possibly due to the varying JavaScript engines in different browsers. A detailed cross-browser script review is essential for ensuring compatibility and consistent user experience.

issues.title: Python API - Slow Response Time
issues.description:
Performance Issue:

Our Python-based REST API's user detail retrieval endpoint is suffering from response times exceeding 500ms, violating our service level agreement (SLA) of 200ms.

Potential Solutions:

Backend service profiling indicates the database query as the primary bottleneck. Query optimization or database schema restructuring, along with a potential caching strategy, should be investigated to meet performance targets.

issues.title: Angular Service Worker - Failing to Update Cache
issues.description:
Caching Problem:

The Angular application's service worker is not updating the cache when new server changes are detected, leading to stale content issues.

Diagnosis:

Initial debugging suggests problems with triggering the correct service worker lifecycle events, likely stemming from errors in the cache invalidation logic specified in 'ngsw-config.json'.

issues.title: Python - Memory Leak in Data Processing Service
issues.description:
Memory Leak Detected:

A growing memory footprint that does not subside post data batch processing is observed, culminating in OutOfMemory errors.

Resolution Approach:

Code review and refactoring for improved memory management, especially in the handling and disposal of large data objects, is urgently needed.

issues.title: Angular - i18n Support Not Working for RTL Languages
issues.description:
i18n Challenge:

Right-to-Left (RTL) language support, such as for Arabic and Hebrew, is malfunctioning, with the application layout failing to adjust accordingly despite correct translation application.

Investigation Focus:

An in-depth review of CSS and Angular's internationalization (i18n) implementation is necessary to ensure full RTL compatibility.

issues.title: Python - Docker Container Exits Unexpectedly
issues.description:
Service Interruption:

The Docker container running our Python web service is exiting without warning or error tracebacks, leading to service outages.

Proposed Solution:

Enhanced exception handling and logging are required to diagnose and address the underlying cause of these abrupt terminations.

issues.title: Angular - Failed to Compile with AOT
issues.description:
Compilation Error:

Ahead-of-Time (AOT) compilation is failing, while Just-In-Time (JIT) compilation succeeds, implying potential issues with AOT's stricter checks.

Investigation Path:

A comprehensive comparison of AOT and JIT processes may reveal the root cause, guiding appropriate fixes.

issues.title: Python - Flask Route Clashing with Blueprints
issues.description:
Routing Conflict:

The introduction of a new Blueprint in the Flask app has resulted in an endpoint clash, overshadowing the '/users' route in the main app.

Resolution Steps:

Revisiting the Flask app's structure and routing system is imperative to ensure a clear route resolution hierarchy and prevent future conflicts.

issues.title: Angular - Component Styling Not Isolated
issues.description:
Styling Issue:

Styles from a shared component are affecting other components, which points to a failure in style encapsulation.

Action Items:

A rigorous review of the Angular component styles and encapsulation modes such as ViewEncapsulation is necessary to fix these styling leaks.

issues.title: Python - Inefficient Query Handling in ORM
issues.description:
Database Performance Hit:

Inefficiencies in the ORM layer are leading to performance-intensive N+1 query problems, significantly affecting systems with large datasets.

Optimization Strategy:

An ORM audit with an emphasis on query optimizations, like select_related and prefetch_related, is needed for performance improvements.

issues.title: Angular - Environment Configuration Overwritten on Deploy
issues.description:
Deployment Issue:

Environment-specific configurations in the Angular application are being reset to defaults upon deployment, causing incorrect API endpoint calls.

Corrective Action:

The CI/CD pipeline scripts require thorough review and adjustments to preserve the environment configurations through deployment stages.

issues.title: Python - Asynchronous Task Queue Delays
issues.description:
Asynchronous Processing Lag:

Background I/O operations in the asynchronous task queue are facing unanticipated execution delays.

Detective Work:

Investigation into the task queue setup and I/O mechanisms is needed to diagnose the delays and enhance task processing efficiency.

issues.title: Angular - Custom Directive Not Reacting to Input Changes
issues.description:
Reactivity Deficiency:

A custom directive for input formatting is not responding to programmatic changes from the component class, though it reacts to user input.

Technical Dive:

Analysis of the directive's change detection strategy and Angular's change detection mechanism is essential to ensure full directive reactivity.

issues.title: Python - CSV Upload Feature Times Out
issues.description:
Upload Timeout:

The synchronous processing of large CSV file uploads is causing server blocks and timeouts.

Proposed Upgrade:

Migrating to an asynchronous processing model, such as utilizing Celery for background tasks, should alleviate the problem and streamline the upload process.

issues.title: Angular - Form Validation Fails Silently
issues.description:
Validation Silence:

Complex validation rules in Angular reactive forms are failing without providing clear user feedback.

Improvement Plan:

Examining and possibly refactoring the custom validators to ensure they return informative and consistent error messages is crucial for user guidance.

issues.title: Angular Devs vs Python Devs - The Great Space Indentation Debate
issues.description:
Indentation Controversy:

A spirited debate over the 'correct' number of spaces for indentation is ongoing between the Angular and Python developer teams.

Peacekeeping Measures:

A decision might need to be reached in a team meeting or all-hands discussion to establish a unified code formatting guideline and avoid a full-blown 'tab' controversy.
